productText.text: Swanson® is made from simple, high-quality ingredients you can recognize. Our chicken is sourced from farms we trust and we select the finest vegetables and spices, picked at the peak of freshness. It starts with real chicken and bones, then we cook our broths and stocks to perfection to deliver a unique balance of flavor.
productText.textHTML: Swanson® is made from simple, high-quality ingredients you can recognize. Our chicken is sourced from farms we trust and we select the finest vegetables and spices, picked at the peak of freshness. It starts with real chicken and bones, then we cook our broths and stocks to perfection to deliver a unique balance of flavor.

productText.text:
Swanson® Natural Goodness™ 100% Natural Chicken Broth features the perfectly balanced flavors of chicken, vegetables and seasonings with 1/3 less sodium than our regular broth.*



*Regular Swanson® Chicken Broth contains 860 mg of sodium per serving.This product contains 570 mg of sodium per serving.

productText.text:
Swanson® Natural Goodness™ 100% Natural Chicken Broth is packed with the perfectly balanced flavors of farm-grown chicken, peak season-picked vegetables and high-quality seasonings with 1/3 less sodium than our regular broth.* Get passionate in the kitchen and create sensational chicken soup and other great recipes by keeping our trustworthy broth on hand.


*Regular Swanson® Chicken Broth contains 860 mg of sodium per serving.This product contains 570 mg of sodium per serving.

productText.text: Swanson® Broth is made from simple, high-quality ingredients you can recognize. Our chicken is sourced from farms we trust and we select the finest vegetables, picked at the peak of freshness. We start with real chicken and bones, then we cook our broths to perfection to deliver a unique balance of flavor. Use our trustworthy broth to add flavor to soups, rice, potatoes, vegetables and stuffing. The best ingredients make the best dishes. Swanson —it's why you cook and stay confident in the kitchen!
